org.efaps.admin.runlevel

Class RunLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.admin.runlevel.RunLevel

  • public final class RunLevel
extends Object
    This Class is the run level for eFaps. It provides the possibility to load only the specified or needed parts into the Cache. It can be defined within the database.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RunLevel.CacheMethod
      Cache for the methods, which are defined for the run level.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(String _runLevel)
                 throws EFapsException
        The static method first removes all values in the caches. Then the cache is initialized automatically depending on the desired RunLevel
        Parameters:
        _runLevel - name of run level to initialize
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • stop

        public static void stop()
        Stops all RunLevel.

      • getName4Current

        public static String getName4Current()
        Returns:
        Return the name of the currenct active RunLevel.

      • isInitialisable

        public static boolean isInitialisable()
                               throws EFapsException
        Tests, if the SQL table TABLE_TESTS exists (= true). This means the run level could be initialized.
        Returns:
        true if a run level could be initialized (and the SQL table exists in the database); otherwise false
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if the test for the table fails
        See Also:
        TABLE_TESTS

      • execute

        public static void execute()
                    throws EFapsException
        Execute the current RunLevel. (Load all defined Caches).
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • executeMethods

        protected void executeMethods()
                       throws EFapsException
        All cache initialize methods stored in cacheMethods are called.
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
        cacheMethods

      • initialize

        protected void initialize(String _sql)
                   throws EFapsException
        Reads the id and the parent id of this RunLevel. All defined methods for this run level are loaded. If a parent id is defined, the parent is initialized.
        Parameters:
        _sql - SQL statement to get the id and parent id for this run level
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
        parent, cacheMethods
